The Commission proposal COM (2004) 71 provides for the repealing of Directive 72/462/EEC and COM (2003) 570 provides for the amendment of Directives 90/426/EEC and 92/65/EEC. The final Council directive is about the amendment of Directives 90/426/EEC and 92/65/EEC and repealing of Directive 72/462/EEC, thus it incorporates in one act what proposed within two separated Commission proposals and handled by two separate procedures.
